title: ECB’s Lagarde Says Embracing AI Can Still Give Europe an Edge
description: Europe’s economy should embrace artificial intelligence and remove any hurdles that could slow its diffusion to avoid missing out on the technology’s benefits, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said.
